page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: A trio of rowers from{Bewdley Rowing {Club}are going to Hong Kong to take part in the Dragon Boat Race. Pupils from Bewdley High School are on an exchange visit with Vellmar, Germany. The{River Severn}is in danger of being turned into a pleasure boating run from Gloucester to Shrewsbury. It is planned to put locks and weirs. Many of the inhabitants object to this scheme as they want the river left in its natural state. In{Bewdley Safari Park}is the new million pound ride called the Cobra. Geoff Capes, the strongest man in the world opened this thrilling run on 18th May 1985. On Sunday 7th July many young people took part in the Wyre Forest Youth Festival. A day of demonstrations, shows, acts and displays were enjoyed.
